short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Step into a neon-lit future with Cyberpunk Girl Live Wallpaper.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This dynamic theme showcases a fierce, futuristic heroine in a glowing cyberpunk cityscape. Enhance your browsing experience with quick website access, customizable shortcuts, and a seamless calendar and clock display. Effortlessly search the web with the built-in search bar.

🖼️ Live Wallpaper: Immerse yourself in a vibrant cyberpunk universe.
🔗 Popular Site Shortcuts: Quickly navigate to your favorite websites.
➕ Add Custom Shortcuts: Personalize your new tab with links you love.
🗓️ Calendar & Time: Stay organized with an easy-to-read date and time feature.
🔍 Web Search Bar: Search smarter with your preferred engine.
Explore more futuristic themes, check out our Privacy Policy, or uninstall conveniently through the provided links.
